AllocateCustomerCredit.document:
This API is used for a partner to set credit for a customer, such as increasing or lowering the credit and setting it to 0.
1. The credit is valid permanently and will not be zeroed regularly.
2. The customer's service will be suspended when its available credit is set to 0, so caution should be exercised with this operation.
3. To prevent the customer from making new purchases without affecting their use of previously purchased products, the partner can set their available credit to 0 after obtaining the non-stop feature privilege from the channel manager.
4. The set credit is an increment of the current available credit and cannot exceed the remaining allocable credit. Setting the credit to a negative value indicates that it will be repossessed. The available credit can be set to 0 at the minimum.
AllocateCustomerCredit.name: Allocates credit to customers by a partner

CreateAccount.document:
This API is used to create a Tencent Cloud account on the partner platform for a customer. After registration, the customer will be automatically bound to the partner account. Notes:
1. The partner should verify the entered email address and mobile number for creating a Tencent Cloud account.
2. The customer needs to complete personal information after the first login.
CreateAccount.name: Creates a customer account

DescribeBillDetail.document: This API is used to query the customer bill details.
DescribeBillDetail.name: Queries the bill details

DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.document: This API is used to obtain the total amount of customer bills by payment mode.
DescribeBillSummaryByPayMode.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by payment mode

DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.document: This API is used to obtain the total amount of customer bills by product.
DescribeBillSummaryByProduct.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by product

DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.document: This API is used to obtain the total amount of customer bills by region.
DescribeBillSummaryByRegion.name: Obtains the total amount of customer bills by region

DescribeCustomerBillDetail.document: This API is used to query the customer bill details.
DescribeCustomerBillDetail.name: Queries the customer bill details

DescribeCustomerBillSummary.document: This API is used to query the total amount of customer bills.
DescribeCustomerBillSummary.name: Queries the total amount of customer bills

DescribeCustomerInfo.document: This API is used to query the customer information.
DescribeCustomerInfo.name: Queries the customer information

DescribeCustomerUin.document: This API is used to query the list of customer UINs.
DescribeCustomerUin.name: Queries the list of customer UINs

GetCountryCodes.document: This API is used to obtain country/region codes.
GetCountryCodes.name: This API is used to obtain country/region codes.

QueryAccountVerificationStatus.document: This API is used to query the account verification status.
QueryAccountVerificationStatus.name: Queries the account verification status

QueryCreditAllocationHistory.document: This API is used to query all the credit allocation records of a single customer.
QueryCreditAllocationHistory.name: Queries credit allocation records

QueryCreditByUinList.document: This API is used to query the credit of users in the list.
QueryCreditByUinList.name: Queries credit by UIN list

QueryCreditQuota.document: This API is used to query customer credits.
QueryCreditQuota.name: Queries customer credits

QueryCustomersCredit.document: This API is used for a partner to the credits and basic information of cutomers.
QueryCustomersCredit.name: Queries the credits of customers

QueryDirectCustomersCredit.document: This API is used to query the credits of direct customers.
QueryDirectCustomersCredit.name: Queries the credits of direct customers

QueryPartnerCredit.document: This API is used for a partner to query its own total credit, available credit, and used credit in USD.
QueryPartnerCredit.name: Queries a partner's credit

QueryVoucherAmountByUin.document: This API is used to query the voucher quota based on the customer UIN.
QueryVoucherAmountByUin.name: Queries the voucher quota based on the customer UIN

QueryVoucherListByUin.document: This API is used to query the voucher list based on the customer UIN.
QueryVoucherListByUin.name: Queries the voucher list based on the customer UIN

QueryVoucherPool.document: This API is used to query the voucher quota pool.
QueryVoucherPool.name: Queries the voucher quota pool
